title: Spain announce Belgium friendly
text:
Spain announce Belgium friendly Â© Getty Images Spain's Euro 2016 preparations will continue with a trip to Belgium on November 17, four days after welcoming England to Alicante. By Matt Law , European Football EditorFiled:   17:58 UK 
The Spanish Football Federation have revealed that the European champions will face Belgium in a friendly on November 17. 
Spain booked their spot at Euro 2016 with a 4-0 win over Luxembourg on Friday, but still have a final qualifier to play against Ukraine on Monday. 
With that in mind, La Roja have revealed their plans for the build-up to next summer's tournament and it will include a friendly with Belgium in Brussels next month. 
Spain, who have won the last two editions of the European championships, will host Roy Hodgson's England in Alicante four days earlier.
